originalText.text:
Quality Security Camera was one of the most professional companies I have dealt with in my 15+ years in the Dumbo. They showed up on schedule and the one time they were delayed at another house they kept me informed of the delay via text messaging and then worked late into the evening to finish my installation on the date promised.
Every time I have reached out to Quality Security Camera they respond within hours. I would highly recommend you consider this company for you security and home automation needs.

PS: Ask about the new crazy cameras (Day & Night), they are no less than amazing.

originalText.text:
I recently moved new a new office in Chelsea and came across Quality Security when looking for a security system. As a new office owner, the amount of information out there about security systems can be so daunting! From the get go, Quality Security was professional, friendly, and quickly responded to my numerous questions. They made the whole process extremely personal and came out to do a consultation, which was so helpful for a security system novice.
The install was seamless and the team (with the awesome manager Donny) was excellent to work with. They gave me a wealth of information and cell phone numbers for any questions. Their accessibility makes me confidant that they will be there for any questions along the way.
I can say that Quality Security did a great job and if you are looking for a local security installer in Chelsea. Donny is the guy for you.

originalText.text: Cedric is extremely knowledgeable and helpful.  I had trouble with my CCTV and he was able to diagnose and provide the solution over the phone and a technician's contact info for by the hour service just in case that didn't fix it.  (it did)  I found Quality Security Camera here on Google and I found them to be as wonderful as all these reviews say they are. As soon as my monitoring contract expires later this year, I'll be signing up with Quality Security Camera so they can provide my monitoring and service going forward.  I found the full service provider I need today and will be back.  Quality Security Camera provides the kind of service I prefer to have and I am glad to know what kind of customer service I can expect from Cedric once I am officially their customer!

originalText.text:
Serious guys. Very clear on what they think need to be done. Unlike other companies that offered minor repair, Kingston from Quality Security Camera insisted that I need to replace all wires and a receiver. So like many business owners, I tried to save some money and did not hire Quality Security Camera.
It took me 3 days to realize that I just burned money that I paid to the company that offered the cheap repair. Called Kingston and asked him to return and pick up the check for deposit.
It was Thursday, and on Monday I got team of pros with all the parts and equipment. Replaced all wires, reprogramed the new system, and Kingston went over everything with me.
Do you want to work with pros? Kingston is your guy and Quality Security Camera is the place to call.

originalText.text:
It was time to upgrade the alarm system, and finally make the camera system work. Since we rented our space in Hoboken we had cameras that not really worked and were just there. I have contacted 3 companies in Hoboken and Quality Security Camera is one of them.  They sent Hector. The only one who came on time (1 company did not show at all).
Prices: Quality Security Camera were about 10% more expensive. But still they got the job. And for the simple reason: Customers service. When you get answers to all questions, when you get the estimate on time and get detailed info why things cost what they cost, you know you found a serious company.
Thank you Quality, You are the quality!!
